Context:
The School of Makeup and Esthetics at George Brown College offers practical skills and knowledge for building a career in the fields of makeup and esthetics. The programs and courses take a hands-on approach and reflect current industry demand, with many teachers remaining active professionals. Students can gain experience by working with real clients in spa and specialized studios. The education received prepares students to make a seamless transition from school to the working world.

The College is located on the traditional territory of the Mississaugas of the Credit First Nation and other Indigenous peoples. Students are encouraged to learn more about land acknowledgment on the college-wide website.

Note: The text does not provide specific information on the programs offered, years, numbers, emails, or names, so those entities are not included in the extracted information.
